form.label: Zeek SNMP (V2.0)
form.description: V2 Additions: Dashboard Now Rides The Zeek_Suite Datamodel

search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SNMP by SNMP.community, SNMP.src, SNMP.dest, SNMP.display_string | rename SNMP.community AS community, SNMP.src AS src, SNMP.dest AS dest, SNMP.display_string AS display_string
| where like (community, "public") AND !like (display_string, "-") | rename community AS Community, src_ip AS "Source IP", dest_ip AS "Destination IP", display_string AS "Display String"

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SNMP by SNMP.community, SNMP.src, SNMP.dest, SNMP.display_string | rename SNMP.community AS community, SNMP.src AS src, SNMP.dest AS dest, SNMP.display_string AS display_string
| where !like (community, "public") | rename community AS Community, src_ip AS "Source IP", dest_ip AS "Destination IP", display_string AS "Display String"
